location.name: Porto i/o Downtown
location.address: R. de Cândido dos Reis 81, 4050-152 Porto

events.name: Porto Codes
events.description: # Agenda ## 19h00 Introduction Small introduction to the Porto Codes project, and a warm up to the night's presentation. ## 19h30 TBA, TBA ## 20h30 Dinner + Santini (icecream) We will have dinner downtown, please let us know of any dietary restrictions so we can plan accordingly. Afterwards it is customary to go for icecream at Santini and continue the conversation. # Porto Codes Porto Codes is a meetup for local and international programming enthusiasts. The talks are recorded and published with the presenters' consent as one of our goals is to provide programming resources to the community. Reach us on Slack (https://invite.porto.codes) if you are interested in presenting or chatting with us!

events.name: Parabéns WordPress! WordPress 15th Anniversary Celebration
events.description: O WordPress vai festejar 15 anos de existência no dia 27 de Maio. Integrado num conjunto de eventos da Comunidade WordPress de todo o mundo, o Meetup WordPress do Porto promove, no dia 24 de Maio, um meetup especial para celebrar 15 anos do sistema de gestão de conteúdos usado em cerca de 30% da Internet. Tu estás convidado para esta festa (talvez haja bolo). Partilha as tuas fotos da festa e mostra o teu envolvimento com o WordPress ao resto do mundo com a hashtag #wp15. Não te esqueças de partilhar o evento. Vamos fazer desta uma data memorável :)

location.name: Faculdade de Engenharia da Universidade do Porto

events.name: Agile Portugal 2018
events.description: Agile Portugal is an annual international conference about Agile Software Development and its practices. In its 9th edition, we expect more than 400 attendees to join us in Porto (FEUP) on a day of conference and workshops.

events.name: TECHinPORTO 2018
events.description: TECHinPORTO was born in 2017 from Jumia's will to share and promote Porto's state of the art Information Technologies. By teaming up with great technology partners, we expect to bring the best from the tech community to our blooming city, learn together and deliver a kickass experience.

events.name: Commit Porto
events.description: Commit Porto is a tech conference to be held in Porto, bringing together professionals from different areas talking about their experience tackling challenges in software development with the latest technologies! It will be an excellent opportunity for knowledge sharing and inherently promote Porto as a vibrant and dynamic city for technology-based companies.
